contest-event.event-date: Oct. 17, 1970 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Championship Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Leidzen] Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 16 bands competed. 9th annual contest.
